title: A Suspicious Employee
overview: Anna is a woman who works at a coffee shop, to raise funds for a party of underprivileged minors. The owner of Anna's coffee shop is Lee Seung Chul. This person is a fetishist in voyeurism and rumors say he is an employee killer. Lee Seung Chul begins to feel attracted to Anna and talks to her friend, who said she had a famous friend chef in pursuit too. The chef is Kim Dong-jin, who works as a gangster evildoer. Who will be with Anna?
